title: Club Leader
body:
BEFORE YOU DELETE THIS RIOT GAMES!
I have posted this in both report a bug and help and support and in both cases it has been deleted and told to move to the other section! I am now posting it in both with this comment!

I am experiencing the bug where I, as the leader of a club, cannot see the club. It does not show up at all on my main account, but other members within the club still see me as the leader. Is there anyway to go about fixing this?

replies.body: Ahh!!  You've come to the right place, so I don't see this being deleted.  There was a [club outage](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016) a bit ago that caused this issue for some club leaders, but it's since been resolved.  If you're still having this issue then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you individually and investigate why it persisted for you.  We'll get back to you!
